reminders.name: Work
reminders.description: Pay your Bills. Do you really want to move back in with mom??

reminders.name: Gym
reminders.description: Hmmmmm, those pants are getting kinda tight.

reminders.name: School
reminders.description: Can't always count on a sugar daddy. Turn off that damned Netflix and do some homework.

reminders.name: Groceries
reminders.description: You're looking a little skinny, fridge is empty again. Make sure you buy something green this time.

reminders.name: Clean
reminders.description: How are you going to get a boyfriend if you cant even clean your room?

reminders.name: Socialize
reminders.description: When was the last time you saw the sun?

reminders.name: Pets
reminders.description: How are you going to take care of a pet if you can't even take care of yourself?

reminders.name: Trash
reminders.description: Time to take out all the trash, including that good for nothing ex.

reminders.name: That Thing
reminders.description: Remember that thing you didn't want to go to but agreed to anyways? It's time.

reminders.name: Call Mom
reminders.description: One of these days I'm not going to be around, then you'll miss me.
